001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Marker for design pattern annotations.
007 * Acts as a top-level grouping.
008 */
009@Documented
010@Retention(RetentionPolicy.SOURCE)
011@Target(ElementType.ANNOTATION_TYPE)
012public @interface DesignPattern {
013
014    enum Category {
015
016        DOMAIN_LANGUAGE("Patterns that create a shared vocabulary and boundaries so requirements read like code and code reads like requirements.\n" +
017                "Covers entities, value objects, aggregates, domain services, and other domain-driven design concepts."),
018        STRUCTURAL("Organize objects into larger structures.\n" +
019                "Covers Composite, Decorator, Adapter, Bridge, Facade, Proxy, Flyweight, composition principle."),
020        OBJECT_GRAPH("Patterns that define how objects are created, located, wired, and assembled into working structures.\n" +
021                "Covers object construction, factories, dependency injection, and service lookup."),
022        EXTENSIBILITY("Patterns and architectural mechanisms that allow systems to be extended, customized, or configured without modifying existing code artifacts.\n" +
023                "Covers Plug-in/Microkernel (module) architecture, Service Provider Interface (SPI), and Module/Package boundaries."),
024        BEHAVIORAL("Patterns that define communication and control flow between objects, focusing on how responsibilities are distributed and interactions are structured.\n" +
025                "Covers Strategy, Template Method, Observer, Command, State, Iterator, Visitor, Mediator, Memento, Chain of Responsibility, Interpreter."),
026        HELPER_STRUCTURES("Lightweight idioms and helper patterns that provide convenience, readability, or reusability at the code level.\n" +
027                "Often language-specific rather than architectural.");
028
029        private final String explanation;
030
031        Category(String explanation) {
032            this.explanation = explanation;
033        }
034
035        public String getExplanation() {
036            return explanation;
037        }
038    }
039
040    Category value();
041
042}
